definitions: in a way that relates to chemistry, or to the interactions of substances as studied in chemistry

examples.text: many of these compounds are chemically reactive

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to chemistry, or to interactions of substances as studied in chemistry

examples.text: her naturally wavy blonde hair was chemically straightened

definitions: relating to or by means of alcohol or intoxicating drugs

examples.text: drugs and alcohol offered a chemically induced sense of belonging

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to alcohol or drug use
